content: of first ​ stitch row 4 *fpdc decrease half_double_crochet* around ​ sew closed that s it you re done add this as a project in ravelry and show me your finished projects or add photos to my instagram @studiosavalle1 note you are free to sell anything you make with this pattern but please link by to my store for credit you are not allowed to distribute this pattern in any part or claim it or the photos are your own you are not allowed to sell this pattern in any ways copyright 2021 studio savalle
